TopicTitle: Transfering Kerbal crew from pod to pod

Articles.Content: I've just docked to my space station. I want to swap around who's on board. I used to transfer crew with Crew Manifest; I removed it as I thought it was now redundant. However, I don't see a way to transfer kerbals without EVA. Is it possible? I guess I can transfer by EVA but I might reinstall CM if this isn't possbile. It's not fun just flying back and forth between ships with 4 Kerbals.
Have this same problem... Hoping for an updated Crew Manifast mod to surface sometime soon
No you can't yet. And Crew Manifest is currently broken for .21

Sort of off-topic but I think this would be the best way for Squad to implement IVA... Kind of like a cutaway, where you could internally "EVA" your crew around your ship, station, whatever it may be.
I'm sure Squad plans to implement proper IVA crew transfer eventually, but until then, Crew Manifest will fulfill that role. Just have a tad of patience and wait for it to update.
